scripts.install: cp -r node_modules/bootstrap assets/ && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome assets/ && cp -r node_modules/jquery assets/ && cp -r node_modules/popper.js assets/ && cp -r node_modules/primer-markdown _sass/ && mv _sass/primer-markdown/build/build.css _sass/primer-markdown/build/build.scss && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap _sass/ && rm -rf node_modules && rougify style github > _sass/rouge.scss
